I see. How long does the battery last before it needs to be recharged?

Do you have trouble finding a place to charge the device?
That is not the problem. Are you mental? It just annoys me that the battery doesn't last very long.
Okay - calm down. I am just trying to determine whether you are one of those customers who is never satisfied.

Not very much. I know you can afford it.
